lines.text: Happy birthday to you, happy birthday to you, happy birthday dear Chloe, happy birthday to you STOP, Signed Frank N. Stein.
[dashes off quickly and then comes back]
That'll be 36 cents please. Hoo hoo hoo hoo hoo!

[about Daffy]
He don't know me very well, do he?

[pushing Chloe's carriage carrying a mallet]
He don't know ME very well, do he?
